name: Fox Wrist Guard
description: An arm protector painted a cunning fox pattern.

name: Fox Wrist Guard [1]
description: An arm protector painted a cunning fox pattern.

name: Free Poring
description: At dusk, a young girl with a torch in her hand leapt over barriers, shouting “go” and rushing toward her enemies. People of Bonaparte began to shoot and the girl died in a pool of blood. Bartholdi heard the truth and could not keep calm for a long period. Since then, the brave girl who held a torch has represented freedom in his mind.

name: Freeman's Coin
description: A coin engraved with the challenger's name. It symbolizes honor and strength for dueling clubs.

name: Fricca's Circlet
description: Hairband blessed by Batul's mother, Goddess Fricca. It seems that you can have a look at the goddess's wisdom.

name: Fricca's Circlet Blueprint
description: Hairband blessed by Batul's mother, Goddess Fricca. It seems that you can have a look at the goddess's wisdom.

name: Fricca's Circlet [1]
description: Hairband blessed by Batul's mother, Goddess Fricca. It seems that you can have a look at the goddess's wisdom.

name: Fricco's Shoes [1]
description: Phee, son of Mulder, attached earth blessing to these boots. Phee's blessing seems to relieve the pain.

name: Fricco's Shoes [2]
description: Phee, son of Mulder, attached earth blessing to these boots. Phee's blessing seems to relieve the pain.

name: Fried Chicken Hero
description: The super-high-class gorgeous crown made by Midgard craftsman and the mystic white beard grandfather of the alien world. The rare out-of-print headwear belongs to the real Fried Chicken Hero!

name: Fried Chicken Hero [1]
description: The super-high-class gorgeous crown made by Midgard craftsman and the mystic white beard grandfather of the alien world. The rare out-of-print headwear belongs to the real Fried Chicken Hero!
effect: All Attributes ＋2,Become a Scenery! Wear [Fried Chicken Hero] to become a Scenery yourself. Adventurers who take photo of it will unlock the event Scenery "KFC Chicken King"!

name: Friendship Chest
description: So happy to see you again, My dear friend!

name: Friendship Chocolate
description: The special chocolate sold by the God of Love from Big Cat Planet on specified day in human's world, the best gift to family and friends. (Effects: you can give this item to NPCs you like or other adventures, Increasing their All Attributes by 5. This effect lasts 5 minutes and is not affected by death or going offline. )

name: Frost Clip
description: “The purest snowflake flying down in this city, purest memory we shall remember. After today, I will be with you forever.”

name: Frost Masquerade Mask
description: Frost Witch's most favorite decoration, Harpy's feather and Frost Mistletoe's dewdrop combined into the purest mask. After wearing it, you will become an elf in the snow.
effect: Atk ＋30, Atk ＋3%,Any Attributes (Str, Agi, Vit, Int, Dex, Luk) that reaches 99, will be able to activate 1 stack of “Frost Focus” effect: Atk＋10, Atk ＋1%; for maximum 6 stacks.

name: Frost Mistletoe
description: In the myth, these Frost Mistletoes growing in the freezing ice cave are transformed from a witch who loves Helios, God of the sun. When under sunlight, it will withered instantly; but it still keep growing out of cave to be under sunlight and die.

name: Frost Rosa
description: When Frost Witch's tear sliding down her face, a Frost Rosa will bloom from it. Even though there will not be a result, still remember the snow scene we saw together holding hands.

name: Frost Winter Whisper Rosette [1]
description: You told me that Morroc will never snow; across the desert to be with you in the northern country is the most romantic thing ever. Every January, I will always wear your favorite Winter Whisper Rosette.  When you helping me tight up the rosette, I want to hug you more closely.

name: Frozen Bow [2]
description: The bow whose body is frosted. I wonder if you can use it.
